医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
音乐课程如何塑造儿童的社交和情感成长长期的音乐指导可以提高儿童的音高匹配技能和某些社会情感能力，在与音乐相关的任务中观察到的效果最为显着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/How-music-lessons-can-shape-childrens-social-and-emotional-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/How-music-lessons-can-shape-childrens-social-and-emotional-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0220bac0-c471-43eb-b3a6-a3573c1a72e2 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 23:45:00 -0400 How music lessons can shape children's social and emotional growth
每天喝醋有助于减轻抑郁症吗？在最近的一项研究中，每天摄入醋在四个星期内显着改善了超重的健康成年人的抑郁评分，这可能是由于烟酸代谢的增强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Could-take-vinegar-every-day-help-reduce-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Could-take-vinegar-every-day-help-reduce-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=514f8d44-28cf-4f39-9cbd-adfdf63aaecd Sun, 21 Jul 2024 23:13:00 -0400 Could taking vinegar every day help reduce depression?
研究显示，澳大利亚焊工暴露在高浓度的危险致癌烟雾中科廷大学的新研究显示，至少 46,000 名澳大利亚焊工在工作中暴露在高浓度的危险、可能致癌的烟雾中；但几乎没有采取任何措施来保护他们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Australian-welders-expose-to-high-levels-of-dangerous-cancer-causing-fumes-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Australian-welders-expose-to-high-levels-of-dangerous-cancer-causing-fumes-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec534d70-f990-41fe-8c9b-4c0ee94624c4 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 22:52:19 -0400 Australian welders exposed to high levels of dangerous cancer-causing fumes, study reveals
突破性疟疾疫苗 RTS、S 和 R21 有望拯救数千人的生命研究论文回顾了首批获得许可的疟疾疫苗 RTS、S 和 R21 的功效，强调了它们显着降低儿童死亡率的潜力，并讨论了未来的疫苗开发策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Breakthrough-malaria-vaccines-RTSS-and-R21-poished-to-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Breakthrough-malaria-vaccines-RTSS-and-R21-poished-to-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=131e8437-de32-4bab-b9ad-f4ca50cfc1f9 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 22:49:00 -0400 Breakthrough malaria vaccines RTS,S and R21 poised to save thousands of lives
未接种疫苗的 COVID-19 患者持续存在长期免疫变化研究表明，未接种疫苗的个体在感染 COVID-19 后长达 10 个月内，其免疫参数会经历显着的长期变化，并出现 Th2 细胞因子谱的转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Long-term-immune-changes-persist-in-unvaccinated-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Long-term-immune-changes-persist-in-unvaccinated-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f8b255d-c51e-4132-90b4-b973cf5484e1 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 22:11:00 -0400 Long-term immune changes persist in unvaccinated COVID-19 patients
藏红花：应对现代健康挑战的黄金良方评论强调了藏红花通过其生物活性化合物预防和治疗各种人类疾病的潜力。临床和临床前研究证实了藏红花对黄斑病、抑郁症、神经退行性疾病和癌症等疾病的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Saffron-A-golden-remedy-for-modern-health-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Saffron-A-golden-remedy-for-modern-health-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d38f9153-8be2-4684-9cbc-c80300e8d5e5 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 22:02:00 -0400 Saffron: A golden remedy for modern health challenges
研究发现按摩疗法缓解疼痛效果的证据有限《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版的一项研究审查了按摩疗法缓解疼痛有效性的证据，发现某些情况的确定性中等，但大多数情况总体确定性较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Study-finds-limited-evidence-for-massage-therapys-effectness-in-pain-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Study-finds-limited-evidence-for-massage-therapys-effectness-in-pain-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4c62432-8efb-4f71-9fbf-6ebf3a231b3c Sun, 21 Jul 2024 21:19:00 -0400 Study finds limited evidence for massage therapy's effectiveness in pain relief
退役橄榄球运动员的脑震荡与较高的神经退行性疾病生物标志物有关《国际分子科学杂志》上的一项研究表明，与非接触性运动参与者相比，有脑震荡史的退役橄榄球运动员与神经退行性疾病相关的生物标志物表现出显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Concussions-in-retired-rugby-players-linked-to-higher-neurodogenic-disease-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Concussions-in-retired-rugby-players-linked-to-higher-neurodogenic-disease-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ce68214-7a48-48f4-a79a-12910efe96ba Sun, 21 Jul 2024 21:08:00 -0400 Concussions in retired rugby players linked to higher neurodegenerative disease biomarkers
英国青少年的超加工食品消费趋势显示出地区和社会经济差异《欧洲营养杂志》的一项研究表明，英国青少年的超加工食品消费量因年龄、种族和社会经济地位而异，且不同地区存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Ultra-processed-food-conspiration-trends-among-UK-adolescents-show-regional-and-socioeconomic-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Ultra-processed-food-conspiration-trends-among-UK-adolescents-show-regional-and-socioeconomic-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a60f5e95-866e-4167-a61d-033c7754f5ac Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:59:00 -0400 Ultra-processed food consumption trends among UK adolescents show regional and socioeconomic disparities
人工智能和成像技术的进步彻底改变了多发性硬化症的诊断《Translational Vision Science & Technology》中的一项研究表明，将人工智能与 IR-SLO 和 OCT 成像相结合可以改善多发性硬化症的自动诊断和分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/AI-and-imaging-advances-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/AI-and-imaging-advances-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b920ba6-f8ba-47b6-b058-698594fc409a Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:47:00 -0400 AI and imaging advances revolutionize multiple sclerosis diagnosis
